name: Baldina's Basis Remade! (Pre-Release 0.1)
description:
Hey again!

since I am working on the Redone Mix Plus Decompile I am releasing This mod! so yes. This is based on KrazzerKits Baldina mod, and most of the assets were made By him, So credit to him.

This will receive Updates now and then, but I Don't plan to update or focus on this a lot!

also if the warning screen says that baldina is broken ignore it since I was able to fix her, and also I still have to update and give new sprites and sounds! 

But anyways I hope you Enjoy!
